name: Congkak
description:
Traditional Congkak Board Game of the Malay Archipelago

This game uses a board that has 7 holes at each side called 'village' which totaled 14 holes, and 2 larger holes at both ends called 'home'.

The Congkak game can only be played by two players at a time. The players will sit opposite each other and the holes will be filled with 7 seeds in each except the two larger holes which contain no seeds. Each player will start the play simultaneously.
